name: Sondera
description: Cedar policy guardrails for OpenClaw — blocks dangerous commands, protects credentials, redacts secrets

a_policyPack.label: Sondera Policy Pack
a_policyPack.help: 41 security rules (sondera-*): blocks rm/sudo/curl|bash, protects credentials, redacts secrets/tokens/API keys (OpenAI, Anthropic, Stripe, etc.). File: ./extensions/sondera/policy-sondera-base.cedar

a2_openclawSystemPack.label: OpenClaw System Protection
a2_openclawSystemPack.help: 24 rules (openclaw-*) protecting workspace files (SOUL.md, IDENTITY.md, SKILL.md, etc.), credentials, sessions, Anthropic/Claude data, and VS Code extensions. File: ./extensions/sondera/policy-openclaw-system.cedar

a3_owaspAgenticPack.label: OWASP Agentic Pack (Advanced)
a3_owaspAgenticPack.help: 38 additional rules (owasp-*) based on OWASP Top 10 for Agentic Applications. More restrictive — may block pip/npm from git, systemctl, cron. File: ./extensions/sondera/policy-owasp-agentic.cedar

b_lockdown.label: Lockdown Mode
b_lockdown.help: Block ALL tools. Overrides Policy Pack — add custom permit rules to allow actions.

c_customRules.label: Custom Rules
c_customRules.help: Add your own Cedar rules (on top of Policy Pack, or standalone if Pack is disabled). Docs: https://docs.sondera.ai/writing-policies/

d_policyPath.label: Custom Policy File (Expert)
d_policyPath.help: Use ONLY this Cedar file. Ignores all settings above.
